name: HextrisRun: Racing
description:
I accept the vast universe.

A brilliant effect stacked up as it breaks !!!
It unfolds before you now.

It runs on the cosmic ring and passes through three fluorescent blocks of the same color.
Your space journey begins.

▶ Game Features
A simple game where the player eats blocks coming out as they move forward!
Sometimes you can even play against your friends alone!

▶ How to play
Single game - If you put 3 blocks of the same color, your score will go up and time will be added!
More time and scores on combo consecutive scoring!

Multi-game - 1vs1 Match three blocks of the same color in the game to attack the opponent!
Run with your friends! Run Run ~ !!
